repatriate.translation[0].definitions[0]: to send someone back to their own country
After the war, prisoners were repatriated.
repatriate.translation[0].definitions[1]: to send profits or money you have earned back to your own country
repatriate.translation[1].definitions[0]: to send money, profits etc back to your own country
Capital gains on investments may be repatriated only once a year.
Japanese companies continue torepatriate some overseasassets.
